## ExtensionManagerInitParams interface

The parameters passed into the extension manager init method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExtensionManagerInitParams<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [portalContainer](./core-types.extensionmanagerinitparams.portalcontainer.md) | <code>PortalContainer</code> | Retrieve the portal container |

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getState()](./core-types.extensionmanagerinitparams.getstate.md) | Retrieve the editor state via a function call |
